title: [Medicine] Scientists have successfully developed an AI model that accurately classify cardiac functions and valvular heart diseases from just chest X-rays. The AUC showed a high level of accuracy, exceeding 0.85 for almost all indicators and reaching 0.92 for detecting left ventricular ejection fraction.
